title: JustJoin Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from JustJoin.it. Supports filtering by keyword, location, employment type, and more.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: JustJoin.it search URLs to scrape. If set, these will be processed via HTML fallback.

keywords.title: Search Keywords
keywords.description: Job title or skills to search (e.g., 'React', 'Python', 'Frontend').

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each job detail page to extract complete descriptions and additional information.

maxItems.title: Maximum Jobs to Extract
maxItems.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Recommended: Use Apify Proxy to avoid blocking.
